name: белый - Belyy
description:
Belyy is a prototype of a cosmic horror game concept.

The idea with this black and white aesthetic is to mess with your comprehension of volumes. I won't explain it here, but the process is related to my researches for creating a video-game adaptation of cosmic horror.

I came up to a lot of concept arts and gameplay ideas which I didn't have the time to include in the demo, it's more a very early prototype than anything.

Feel free to try it out and give feedback, I appreciate it !

Ambient music: INSOMNIA - Dark Hallway

Everything else is homemade.
